name: UDP Quest
description:
In UDP Quest you are a data package that has to travel the internet with a horrible net connection. Side-kick the walls and use your hook to move, as there's no ground to stand on!

This is our ever second gamejam and it was a blast to participate

Music and description by RubiVGM

Programming and visuals Bley

Only non self-produced asset is the font which is: Press Start 2P
